title: Tickets are On Sale For Bespoke Film Night and a Sneak Peek at The Radavist’s New Documentary!
content:
At BESPOKED 13 (and in just over two weeks’ time!) the custom bicycle showcase be hosting its first cycling film night with the support of @condorcycles on Saturday, June 29th, from 18:00 to 22:00. You can catch a sneak peek at our new Radavist documentary there!

Join the party in the Angel screening room at Victoria Baths for a curated selection of favorite short films. Enjoy a complimentary Aperol spritz and popcorn while you watch.

The lineup features shorts from @theradavist @sebastiankrogh_ @pedaled_official @thetranscontinental @tay.velo @albion.cycling @mattsorensenn @dear_susan_

Tickets are free but limited, so click over to BESPOKED to reserve yours!

Food from @bastards_bistro and beers from @brickbreweryse15 and @mash__gang will also be available in the Bar Pool throughout the event…

The post Tickets are On Sale For Bespoke Film Night and a Sneak Peek at The Radavist’s New Documentary! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
